mentions.tacticalSituation: The election in Rushcliffe is between the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats. Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Labour supporters voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats. The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Liberal Democrats this time.

images.caption: Mike Smithson Polling and Elections Expert

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mike Smithson considers tactical voting critical in the Rushcliffe constituency, suggesting that Labour supporters should back the Liberal Democrats to prevent a Conservative victory.
